sentence: A template PRISMA flow diagram is provided, which can be modified depending on whether the systematic review is original or updated (fig 1).

16a
Describe the results of the search and selection process, from the number of records identified in the search to the number of studies included in the review, ideally using a flow diagram (see fig 1).
A template PRISMA flow diagram is provided, which can be modified depending on whether the systematic review is original or updated (fig 1).
